pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fluid Data Transformations // Supplies higher-order fluid data transform operators that include pivot and anti-pivot as special cases. The methodology is describe in 'Zumel', 2018, "Fluid data reshaping with 'cdata'", http://winvector.github.io /FluidData/FluidDataReshapingWithCdata.html , doi:10.5281/zenodo.1173299 . Works on in-memory data or on remote data using 'rquery' and the 'DBI' database interface.
